page.title: 10MR.WEBB THE FARMER
page.content: We interviewed Mr.Webb about his farm.His great great Grandfather was the first to rent it.In 1800 he was the first of the family to own it. He has about 800 acres of land.He does not sell from the door, but he used to sell dairy products, butter, milk etc. He owns 4 four wheel drive tractors, 1 combine_ harvester, 1 seed drill, 1 plough & 2 sprayers.The sprays he uses are 31B, W4 and 01.He sells malting barley for beer and whisky.He grows very little corn.15 bullocks graze in spring.5 men work for Mr.webb, they trim the hedges beside the road.The farm has been farmed for 200 years.The crops are barley, wheat,rape and beans. He sprays the crops 3 times a year. He lives with a house keeper,who was a matron at a school.There are 9 grave_ stones with Webb on in the churchyard.
